headline: Does Marsh McLennan’s Valuation Reflect Its 71% Five Year Gain And Rising Risk Advisory Role?
summary: Wondering if Marsh & McLennan Companies is quietly turning into a value opportunity, or if the market already prices it for perfection? This breakdown will help you see where the stock really stands. The share price has been fairly steady in the short term, up 0.3% over the last week and 1.5% over the past month. However, that sits against a tougher backdrop with the stock down 13.3% year to date and 18.5% over the last year, while still being up 71.0% over five years. Recent headlines...
